title: Schaerer Coffee Art Plus Espresso Coffee Maker
item_description:
Schaerer Coffee Art Plus Espresso Coffee Maker

  • Manufacturer: Schaerer
  • Model Number: SCAP STEAM
  • Voltage: 240 Volts
  • Width: 18”
  • Length: 16”
  • Height: 28” Overall
  • Steam wand with finesteam air injection and auto shut-off. Make great cappuccinos or lattes. Two hoppers, each with dedicated grinders and 2.2 lbs. capacity.
  • Seller States That This Lot Is in Working Conditions. Dolly Is Not Included
  • Photos are representative of this lot.
